pageContext.claim: “They didn't do that. Nobody saw the inside of the Oval Office. They never discussed the building of a wall and how to build it and what's the best way to get it up [during previous administrations].”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, the Obama administration considered revamping the system of pedestrian fences and vehicle barriers along the Southern border as part of a comprehensive immigration overhaul in 2013 -- similar to the enhanced fencing Trump is building.
